amendment.description: An amendment numbered 1 printed in Part B of House Report 115-39 to extend the timeline to implement the fellowship program from 90 days to one year and extends the GAO reporting deadline from one to two years. Also, the amendment removes the requirement to track a number of hiring effectiveness metrics, changes the establishment of a recruiting database from a "shall" to "may" authority, and stipulates that HR training be accomplished virtually.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Wenstrup amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A001) offered by Mr. Wenstrup.
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Wenstrup amendment (A001) Agreed to by voice vote.
Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
